file_content.text: You've served our master, and I'm honored to have helped.
I found the remains of the Imperial guardsmen. They carried this.
Their orders. I can't read these, but--our master will have a way. The Emperor will have no secrets, and his plan will proceed.
May I ask... you're his Hand. What is Lord Jadus truly like?
His mind doesn't work like ours. I can't say what he's like--only that I'm honored to serve.
Lord Jadus is brilliant.
As am I. Thank you for allowing me a part in it.
Imagine neverending suffering and hatred. That's his dream for the universe.
He's a curse on the galaxy.
He wants to remake us in his image.
I've done my part. Encouraging your obsession isn't one of my duties.
I'm not going to answer that.
As you will.
Serve him well, for all of us.
Seek the fallen of the Emperor's guard.
Cipher Nine. Stop.
It is an honor to be in your presence. I share the mark of our master.
I'm afraid you have me at a disadvantage.
Who are you?
Forgive me. I was given a message.
We all serve to the best of our abilities.
Our "master." Of course...
Yet he chose you, even in his summons to me.
I don't know who you think I am, or what "master" you're talking about.
You must want someone else.
You know. The lord of us all. I carry his words to me.
Exile. The time has come for you to serve your purpose. Seek my Hand and obey.
The Emperor's servants walk your world. His honor guard battles Jedi, and I would know why.
The Imperial Guard is here, on Hoth. I can help you find them to learn their purpose--in our master's name.
Darth Jadus wants us for a mission. You'll need to tell me more.
Fill me in on the details.
I wasn't expecting our master to have eyes out here.
You serve Darth Jadus?
He sent me as a test--to endure the shards of frost piercing every vein. To suffer in ways I would remember.
I was one of the first he chose when he returned to Dromund Kaas. I am grateful for that, and for this chance to prove myself.
You're his agent on Hoth, and he wants us to investigate the Imperial Guard?
So let's discuss the job.
The Imperial Guard is the Emperor's elite. Their presence must mean... I don't know what it means.
What made you worth Lord Jadus's attention?
How did he choose you?
My insignificance. I was a slave.
Which makes you a brainwashed slave in the cult of Jadus.
You're a fanatic.
We can't all be privileged as you.
I can't drop everything just because Jadus calls. He can get in line.
I have other missions.
You can't! You won't.
We can move swiftly and subtly. The Imperial Guard is the Emperor's elite force, but they are mortal.
They arrived planetside only a few days ago, and where they've died fighting the Jedi, there may be answers for our master. You could recover the Emperor's orders.
Give me the battlefield coordinates, and I'll scout around.
I'll take a look.
Getting involved with the Emperor... it almost sounds like Jadus is planning treason.
Are we opposing the Emperor?
Our master wishes to understand the ruler of us all. How can that be treason?
We act in his name.
You want to earn our master's favor? You can handle this yourself.
It's not my problem.
I can't. And he'll know--please...
I have nothing for you. I apologize.
